about_the_game:
Postmortal is a modern take on the classic hack and-slash action RPG genre, where an intricate, engaging and satisfying combat system meets the relationship-building mechanics of a dating simulator.

Explore a shattered world, uncover the past and become a dominant force in shaping its future by slaying enemies, making friends, collecting loot and equipment, braving dungeons and hostile environments, and grow so powerful that you rival the might of the gods themselves!

Key Features

  • Battle a wide range of enemies with an even wider range of equipment, including swords, spears, axes, shields, staffs, crossbows and more! Every weapon you find has its own play-style that will make every encounter unique.

  • Collect loads of weapons, armour and accessories to equip. Customise your build to maximise the synergies between your equipped items – becoming overpowered is the goal!

  • Explore a vast world of hostile environments from a forest cloaked in darkness to a swamp filled with the corpses of dead gods. Delve into dangerous dungeons to find glory and loot.

  • Befriend and Romance a cast of quirky characters, each with a unique backstory and personality. How you interact with them matters as each character has their own relationships with other characters - you can't befriend everyone equally!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB memory, supports OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB memory, supports OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Postmortal is a top-down action RPG meets dating simulator set in a shattered world after death. Explore, collect loot, make friends and battle foes to aid Elyir in her mission to restore the order that once was.
